data.title: 2022 Top 10 Computer Manufacturing Companies in the World
data.meta_description: Discover the top 10 best computer companies in 2022. Find out the best laptop and personal computer manufacturing companies ready to make a breakthrough.
data.text:
The computer manufacturing industry is a dynamic and competitive field that plays a crucial role in today's technology-driven world. With the rise of digitalization and the increasing dependence on technology, the demand for computers has only grown over the years. Consequently, knowing the computer companies that make the best laptop and computer products in the market is vital.

In this article, we have compiled a list of the top 10 computer manufacturers of 2022. We've looked at a variety of factors, such as market share, brand reputation, product quality, and innovative product offerings, to determine which companies are leading the pack in terms of providing quality computing solutions for both consumers and businesses alike.

Likewise, these brands are included based on their market share in the global economy. The global market share of personal computer manufacturers consists of desktop computers, laptop computers, and netbooks, excluding mobile devices, such as tablet devices that do not belong to the class of 2-in-1 PCs or convertible laptops.

From established industry giants like to more recent upstarts, we have included a wide range of companies that have proven themselves reliable sources of technological advancement. Read on to find out which brands made our list!

Rank Computer Companies Market Share as of 2022 1 Lenovo Group Limited 24.1% 2 HP Inc. 19.4% 3 Dell Technologies Inc. 17.5% 4 Apple Inc. 9.8% 5 AsusTek Computer Inc. 7.2% 6 Acer Inc. 6.5% 7 Toshiba Corporation < 6% 8 Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. < 6% 9 Sony Corporation < 6% 10 Microsoft < 6%

Top 10 Computer Manufacturing Companies in the World

These are the World's Top 10 Best Computer Companies based on market share for 2022. Market share refers to the percentage of total sales within an industry that a particular company generates. This metric is used to gauge a company's size in relation to its competitors. Therefore, the market leader within an industry is the company with the largest market share.

It is calculated by dividing the company's sales by the total sales of the industry over a specific period. Investors and analysts carefully monitor changes in market share as it can be a sign of the relative competitiveness of a company's products or services.

A company can increase its market share by implementing new technologies through customer loyalty, hiring talented employees, and acquiring competitors. Market share is also an indicator of growth and success for a company.

1. Lenovo: The largest personal computer manufacturer globally

Lenovo is an iconic Chinese technology company manufacturing computers since 1984. The market data shows that Lenovo has solidified its position as the largest PC manufacturer globally. Moreover, with a 24.1% market share in 2022, Lenovo's dominance in computer technology is undeniable.

But what sets Lenovo apart from other computer companies? The company boasts an impressive track record of providing innovative technology products and services. Lenovo's desktop computers and laptops are designed for both business and home use, so there's something for everyone's needs. From the highly acclaimed ThinkPad line to the Yoga brand of convertible laptops, Lenovo continues to push the boundaries of what's possible in computing.

Lenovo is also known for delivering top-notch customer support and after-sales service. Evidently, its loyal customer base speaks volumes about the company's commitment to customer satisfaction.

Another reason Lenovo has emerged as a top player is its smart business strategy. Over the years, Lenovo has expanded its offerings beyond traditional PCs and now includes servers, storage devices, and other enterprise solutions.

Overall, Lenovo's success can be attributed to its focus on innovation, quality products, and customer satisfaction. As the computer manufacturing industry continues to evolve, there's no doubt that Lenovo will remain a key player in shaping the future of computing.

2. HP: A well-established and respected computer company

HP is one of the world's leading computer brands and laptop manufacturers, with a presence in more than 170 countries. This American multinational company has been around since 1939 and has been at the forefront among the best computer companies ever since. HP products include laptops, desktops, monitors, printers, servers, and more.

HP is known for its reliable and high-quality products, particularly focused on business users. The company's laptops, desktops, and monitors are designed with productivity in mind, with features such as fast processors, plenty of RAM, and large displays. HP also offers a wide range of servers and storage solutions, allowing businesses to scale up as needed.

The company has a robust support network, with service centers located worldwide. HP provides users access to various online support options, including troubleshooting guides, software updates, and repair services.

3. Dell: A major player in the PC market known for its high-performing device

Dell produces high-quality and reliable desktops, laptops, and workstations. According to recent market data, Dell secured the top spot in the US PC market based on shipments with a 26.8% market share, ahead of HP with 23.2%.

One of the main advantages of Dell is its wide range of products. Whether you need a laptop for everyday use or a powerful server for business applications, Dell has a product for every need. Markedly, the company is a leader in the gaming laptop space with its Alienware brand, catering to the needs of professional gamers and enthusiasts alike. Its XPS line is equally impressive, featuring sleek designs and powerful processing capabilities.

In addition to consumer products, Dell is a major provider of enterprise-level solutions, specializing in servers, storage, and networking equipment. Its acquisition of EMC in 2016 further solidified its position in the data center market. Dell's products are also renowned for their high quality and durability, offering reliable performance for many years.

The company also offers excellent customer support and technical assistance. With various help options, including online tutorials, phone support, and live chat, Dell customers can get help quickly and efficiently. The company also has a robust network of certified service providers who can help customers with any technical problems.

Dell's commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction has made it a formidable player in the PC market, and it is likely to remain among the top computer companies for years to come.

4. Apple: The leader in computer innovation

When it comes to computer innovation, Apple has always been at the forefront. Founded in 1976, Apple is known for its innovation, high-quality products, and ability to stay ahead of the curve. Lest, from the Macintosh in the 1980s to the iMac, up to the MacBook, Apple has consistently delivered innovative products that have changed the way we use technology.

In 2022, Apple was not only the leader in computer innovation but also the most profitable company in the world and is the only computer manufacturer to consistently be on the list since its inception.

One of the reasons why Apple is so successful is its ability to design and create products that are both user-friendly and aesthetically appealing; known for their sleek designs, high-performance processors, and long battery life.

Also, Apple has always prioritized the user experience. Specifically, they pay attention to the smallest detail like keyboard design, trackpad functionality, screen resolution, and acoustics. They put a lot of research into their proprietary software and hardware design, ensuring every product works seamlessly.

Consequently, their attention to detail and innovation has resulted in a loyal customer base, many of whom swear by their products, appreciating the consistently high level of quality and reliability that comes with every Apple product.

There's no denying that Apple continues pushing the boundaries and setting the industry's standard. Thus, their products are a testament to their commitment to excellence and quality, which is why they have remained at the top for decades.

5. Asus: A computer manufacturer known for excellent gaming laptops and powerful devices

Asus is a household name in the computer manufacturing industry, basically known for producing high-performance laptops and powerful computing devices. Founded in 1989, the Taiwanese company has become one of the best computer companies in the world, offering innovative and reliable products that meet the needs of consumers.

Asus' main product lineup includes desktop PCs, laptops, gaming rigs, and mobile computing solutions. Their desktop PCs are designed to handle everyday tasks, from word-processing applications to high-end gaming and intensive graphics applications. Asus' laptops range from ultra-portable ultra-books to large gaming rigs with high-end graphics cards. For those looking for mobile computing, Asus offers tablets, 2-in-1s, and Chromebooks. All of these solutions come in a variety of price points, allowing consumers to find the perfect balance of performance and affordability.

In addition to its products, Asus also offers a range of services and software solutions. Their cloud storage services provide secure storage for files and applications, while their software solutions range from productivity and security applications to gaming and entertainment solutions. Asus also provides a variety of online support options, ranging from email and chat support to in-person technical support.

Evidently, Asus is a reliable brand that has earned a reputation for producing excellent gaming laptops and powerful computing devices for gamers and creatives alike. The company's dedication to innovation and premium experiences has kept it at the forefront of the laptop and desktop manufacturing industry. Nevertheless, it consistently tops the list of manufacturers to consider.

6. Acer: A computer company with competitive pricing and solid features

Acer is one of the world's leading computer companies, offering a wide range of products, from gaming laptops to all-in-ones, Chromebooks, and more. Founded in 1976, Acer has grown to become one of the world's largest computer manufacturers, with a presence in more than 160 countries and territories.

They have a wide range of products to suit every customer's needs, from budget to high-end gaming laptops. The company's laptop range includes the Aspire, Nitro, Swift, and Spin series. Acer also offers a selection of Chromebooks, which are perfect for students and travelers, as well as all-in-ones for those who need a desktop computer but don't have the space for a full-sized tower.

The company is known for its reliable performance and good value for money. Additionally, many of Acer's laptops come with extended warranties, so customers can be sure their devices will last.

Overall, Acer is a brand that strikes a balance between affordability and performance. With its competitive pricing, solid features, and long warranties, Acer devices are ideal for those looking for efficient computing without breaking the bank.

7. Toshiba: A trusted computer company name in the industry

Toshiba is a Japanese multinational conglomerate specializing in electronics, semiconductors, and computer hardware. Established in 1939, Toshiba is one of the world's largest hardware and electronics companies and is respected for its innovative products and services.

The company has a wide range of products, including laptops, desktops, and tablets, all of which are known for their durability, reliability, and high-quality performance. Toshiba laptops are popular among professionals, students, and everyday users alike, thanks to their sleek design and solid features.

Toshiba has also been recognized for its commitment to sustainability with its eco-friendly products and initiatives. The company has been dedicated to reducing its environmental impact by implementing measures such as using recycled materials in its products and reducing energy consumption.

As a trusted name and one of the most prominent computer companies, Toshiba has earned its reputation through quality products and excellent customer service. Their laptops and other products are built to last and are backed by a full warranty and support system.

In conclusion, Toshiba is a strong contender in the best computer brands and laptop junction, offering high-performance devices, high-quality and durable products, and a commitment to sustainability. For any individual or business looking for a reliable and trustworthy computer brand, Toshiba is a name to consider.

8. Samsung: High-performance device

Samsung is widely known for its popular line of Galaxy smartphones, but it also boasts a range of high-performance laptops and tablets. The company has established itself as a trusted name in the tech industry, and its laptops are no exception. Here are some reasons why Samsung's products stand out in today's market.

Sleek and Stylish Designs: Samsung is well-known for its elegant and stylish designs. Their devices are often praised for their slim profile, making them an excellent choice for those who are always on the go.

High-Performance: Samsung laptops and tablets are built with powerful processors and high-quality components that allow for smooth, fast performance. Whether you're browsing the internet, streaming videos, or gaming, Samsung products are sure to meet your performance needs.

Ample Storage Space: Samsung laptops offer ample storage space, which is crucial for many users. With plenty of storage, you can store all your important files, documents, and media without worrying about running out of space.

Advanced Security Features: Samsung laptops and tablets are equipped with advanced security features that help to protect your devices and your personal information. These features include biometric sensors and encrypted drives, which help to keep your data safe from unauthorized access.

Samsung is a significant player in the tech industry, with a range of high-performance laptops designed to meet its users' needs. If you're after a high-quality device that offers speed, performance, style, and security, Samsung is definitely worth considering.

9. Sony: Computer company that is popular for its sleek and stylish designs

Sony is a Japanese technology company with a strong reputation for its sleek and stylish designs in the list of best laptop brands. Sony's commitment to producing high-quality and innovative products has positioned it as a leader in the industry.

The company specializes in producing laptops and tablets that are sleek and stylish with powerful features. They are known for their reliable performance and longevity. Sony laptops and tablets come in a wide range of prices, from affordable to premium, making them accessible to a wide range of customers.

Their focus on design and innovation has resulted in several award-winning products, such as the VAIO series. The VAIO series is a range of laptops that combine style and performance, making them an instant hit among tech enthusiasts.

Sony's products are not only aesthetically pleasing but also reliable and durable. Their laptops are equipped with powerful processors, long battery life, and high-quality displays that provide an excellent browsing and multimedia experience.

The company's commitment to design and innovation has made it a sought-after brand in the computer manufacturing industry. Their sleek, stylish, and reliable products make them an excellent choice for customers who prioritize both form and function in their computing devices.

10. Microsoft: A household name in computer systems

This multinational computer company is undoubtedly a household name in computer operating systems, making it an essential player in the computer hardware and software industry. Microsoft also offers cloud computing services through its Azure platform.

Apart from creating impressive software and computing services, Microsoft's Surface laptops and tablets have become recognizable and highly sought-after for their sleek design, exceptional power, and features.

Overall, Microsoft's contributions to the computer manufacturing industry are significant and far-reaching. Its innovative software and hardware products continue to impress and solve real-world problems, making it one of the computer companies to watch in the future of the computer industry.

Pros and Cons of the 10 Best Computer Brands in the World

Each computer companies have its own advantages and disadvantages. Hence, it is essential for consumers to research and consider their specific needs before making a purchase.

1. Lenovo Group Limited

Advantages:

Wide range of products: They also offer a range of options for different price points and needs

Reliable and durable

Affordable laptops and desktops with solid performance

Strong focus on innovation and sustainability: Innovative designs, such as laptops with detachable screens

Strong reputation in the industry, particularly for laptops and business-focused products

Extensive manufacturing capacity due to a strong presence in China

Disadvantages:

Some users have expressed frustration with Lenovo's bloatware and pre-installed unnecessary software

It may not offer as much customization as other companies

Mixed reviews on customer support and technical assistance

Laptops are known for their bulkiness and heavy weight

2. HP Inc.

Advantages:

Diverse product range: From budget-friendly laptops to high-end workstations and printers

Quality computer hardware at competitive prices

Strong enterprise offering: With products designed specifically for businesses, such as its Elite series devices

Strong support network and customer service

Products are customizable

Good warranty and support system

Widely recognized: Strong track record in the industry

Disadvantages:

Products can be quite expensive, particularly for those on a tight budget

They may not always prioritize innovation

Laptops are known for their poor battery life

Its products are often criticized for being bulky and heavy

Some users find HP products to be less durable than other options

Mixed reviews on customer support and technical assistance

Decreased market share in recent years

3. Dell Technologies Inc.

Advantages:

Wide range of affordable and reliable products for business and personal use

Products are also aimed at gamers, with high-performance options available

High-quality laptops and desktops that are customizable and user-friendly

Good reputation for reliability and quality control

Innovative designs, such as foldable and dual-screen laptops

Strong online store

Excellent customer support system

Products can be expensive, and customization options can raise the price even higher

4. Apple Inc.

Advantages:

An iconic brand known for its premium design, high-quality materials, and innovative features

It has a loyal customer base and a robust ecosystem of products and services

Reliable and features cutting-edge technology: Powerful and efficient processors with custom architecture

Integration between hardware and software with iOS and MacOS

Strong reputation for user-friendly interfaces, which are often used in creative industries

Disadvantages:

Products are expensive and not easily customizable compared to competitors

High price point for premium products, limiting accessibility

Limited flexibility and customization compared to Windows-based computers

Closed system restricting third-party developers

Compatibility with other products (do not always have the best compatibility with other brands, limiting the number of devices you can use with an Apple product.)

Repair services are costly and limited to authorized service providers

Controversies over multiple aspects, such as labor conditions in the supply chain and anti-competitive practices

5. AsusTek Computer Inc.

Advantages:

Wide range of innovative products

Known for affordable, quality, and reliable laptops and desktops

Laptops are focused on gaming, offering high performance at reasonable prices

Products are customizable and user-friendly

Commitment to innovation and sustainability

Long-term warranties and repair services

Disadvantages:

Laptops can be more expensive than those from other laptop companies

They may not be the best choice for those seeking a versatile or business-focused product

Some users may find ASUS products lacking in reliability

6. Acer Inc.

Advantages:

Affordable and accessible laptops and desktops suitable for everyday use

Solid features, performance, and reliability: Its gaming laptops, especially the Predator series, are highly sought after for their powerful graphics cards and excellent performance

Extensive product line, including gaming laptops and tablets

Products are user-friendly and lightweight

Competitive pricing: A convenient choice for those seeking a budget-friendly product, offering a range of affordable laptops and desktops

Provides a good warranty and customer support system

Products are customizable and user-friendly

Excellent customer support system

Wide variety of products, from high-end gaming PCs to budget-friendly laptops

Sony is known for its high-tech features and sleek design

Innovative and customizable

10. Microsoft

Advantages:

Extensive hardware and software offerings, including Surface laptops and tablets

Products are reliable and offer a wide range of features

Products are well integrated with other Microsoft products, making it seamless to use them together

Availability, making them accessible to a larger customer base

Offers its customers the opportunity to license their products and services, allowing them to save money on software and hardware

Excellent customer service and technical support

Disadvantages:

Products may be expensive and may not always prioritize innovation

They have faced controversies around privacy and security in the past

Conclusion

The computer industry has experienced significant growth over the past decade, and 2022 is no exception. With new technology being developed and existing technology being improved upon, the world of computer manufacturing is an ever-evolving landscape. With advances in technology, computer companies can expect to see increased demand for their products.

The driving factors for the global computer market are technological advancements with upgraded features, internet usage with an increasing number of internet users, PC replacement cycle designed to make replacement feasible, the growing population in emerging economies, competition between tech giants, and falling computer prices.

These factors have contributed to the growth of the PC industry, which is projected to reach USD 240.5 billion by 2026. The top 10 computer companies in the world account for 90% of the global PC market share.
